title: Dealing with chargebacks, Question
body: Now, I know this is dumb but basically my friend scammed me I wanted $200 usd RP and I got it, but using his card and I guess he lied to his credit card company as unauthorized. So now I gotta pay it back, was wondering can I pay back in small increments or riots wants it all in full? please respond as this can help me 5000% cause I have to pay rent and stuff u know how it is....... :( help me out guys thanks

replies.body:
Ouch, that sounds like a rough situation, mate. I'm sorry to hear you're going through this. It's obviously too late now, but these types of situations are a big reason why we don't recommend transactions like this that occur outside of the client. Regarding the chargeback, yes, you'll have to pay it back in full before the account is released. You can find out more about chargebacks in our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks), so I recommend checking that out.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
